title: Crafting failed
body:
Hi,

I am tyring to open my free hextech chest and I get this message:
https://gyazo.com/d1c2001ec7aa011af07987a6716eb0d4

Can anyone help please?

replies.body: Hey guys, thanks for the reports here!  It seems that some players are getting the bad motivator error when unlocking a New Player chest.  If you're impacted by this, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll manually process it for you.  We'll see you there!

Thanks for the screenshot!  Your network might be having an issue communicating with the hextech crafting service, so it can't transmit info like using and yielding crafting content.  As a first step, relog if you haven't already.  Then go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to remove any blocks along the way.  Let me know if that helps!
